SEARCH
Package photos32.controller

Class AlbumViewController

java.lang.Object
photos32.controller.AlbumViewController
public class AlbumViewController extends Object
Controller class for the album view. Handles UI interactions related to displaying and maniulating photos in an album. Connected to AlbumView.fxml.

    • populatePhotoTiles

      public void populatePhotoTiles()
      Populates the photo container with photo tiles representing each photo in the current album.

      Loads FXML components for each photo and sets their corresponding data and parent controller reference.

    • openPhoto

      Opens the detailed photo view for the given photo.
      Parameters:
      photo - the Photo to display
      isSearchResult - indicates if the album is currently associated with a search result
